annual_report: Here you find the annual report (in German) with a detailed description of our work.
betterplace_text: Donate now for „Unterstütze Die Lernwerkstatt - lernen und lernen lassen e.V.“ with our partner betterplace.org. You can also transfer money directly to our account. The bank details are available in our membership form.
common_subtitle: Die Lernwerkstatt is a learning platform independent of age for learners in, out, or alongside school.
contact_policy: I approve my consent with the copyright regulations and the privacy policy.
contactmap_text:
From S-Bahn Treptower Park or U-Bahn Hermannplatz take bus 194 to Bouchéstraße.
Or take bus 104 to Heidelberger Straße and walk for 5 minutes.

mailchimp_gdpr: We use Mailchimp as our marketing platform. By clicking below to subscribe, you acknowledge that your information will be transferred to Mailchimp for processing. Learn more about Mailchimp's privacy practices here.
mailchimp_info: Die Lernwerkstatt will use the information submitted in this form to stay in contact with you and to send updates and marketing-information. Please let us know how you want to hear from us:
mailchimp_policy: You can change your mind anytime by clicking on the unsubscribe-link included in the footer of every email you receive from us, or by contacting us at info@die-lernwerkstatt.org. We will handle your information with care and respect. Further information to our data protection practices can be found on our website. By clicking below to subscribe you agree with the use of your information according to the stated terms.
partners_subtitle: We are very grateful for our partners:
projects1_text: „Ich Bin Hier!“ is a new project, driven by Die Lernwerkstatt and our partner organizations Loesje e.V. and SanaD e.V.. The project targets young people between 6 and 18 years who have an interest in media & culture. There will be several workshops until the end of 2019 - dates can be found online!
projects2_text:
A meetup for people who are interested in free- and self-learning. Get to know each other, ask questions, and play games. Participation is free, donations to hosting organizations are welcome:
  • Die Lernwerkstatt
  • BVNL
  • Alliance for Self-Directed Education
projects3_text:
The goal of this project is to develop learning formats for workshops and schools which combine natural sciences and art. We want to provide a playful and vivid access to the seemingly dry and unpopular „subjects“ math and natural sciences.
We are looking for new workshop leaders. Do you want to join us? Just send an email to: info@mathe-x-kunst.de!
projects4_text: Our „Lernbegleitung“ is a school accompanying project. In small groups of maximum 7 students we will go through the weekly school topics in a playful and active learning environment. The focus does not lie on grades but in the assistance of the individual learning process.
subscribe_archive: Here you can access our newsletter archive since May 2018 and here you can see all newsletters since the founding of Die Lernwerkstatt.
subscribe_text:
Sign up for our newsletter! We send it about 4 times a year.

That's how they look like:
support_subtitle: Do you want to support us?
support_text:
Die Lernwerkstatt is a registered nonprofit organization. Here you can find our charter (German) with aims and goals of our organization. The project lives of your participation. Become a member if you want to support and sustain Die Lernwerkstatt long term! Further options to support us can be found below.

To cover our costs (for location, materials, teachers, electricity, and insurance) we depend on donations in form of monthly membership contributions - scalable up from 5 euro. Here you can find our privacy policy (German), with further information to our data protection regulations.

We are a registered nonprofit organization so all donations and membership contributions are tax deductible! Up to 200 euro a simple statement is enough. Up from 200 euro we will be happy to send you a donation receipt!
values1_description: Self-directed learning is a matter close to our hearts. You determine what, when, where and with whom you (actively) learn. It is up to you where your learning process takes you, what goals you set yourself, what topics and interests you follow and what methods you use to do this. We are only companions in this process and are at your side with words and deeds.
values2_description: The learning workshop (Lernwerkstatt) is a growing community of learners - young people who are educating themselves in or outside of school and adults who share their interests with others, learn more and discover new topics. Learning becomes a co-constructive process when people can bring their own perspectives, experiences and skills to all levels of the learning workshop.
values3_description: Our methods, means and thought processes are creative. In the learning workshop, learners and learning guides have the space to creatively design learning processes. Diversity needs freedom and inventiveness - you will find both in the learning workshop.
